content: x 3 18scs round 11 1sc in every single_crochet around 18scs round 12 1sc increase 2sc increase x 5 1sc 24scs round 13 1sc in every single_crochet around 24scs round 14 3sc increase x 6 30scs ©ali debuc 2021 round 15 2sc increase 4sc increase x 5 2sc 36scs round 16 5sc increase x 6 42scs tip after completing rnds 16 and 23 place a stitch marker in any stitch to mark the row this will help you find your place when sewing on the arms and legs at the end round 17-23 1sc in every single_crochet around 42scs round 24 5sc 1dec x 6 36scs tip after working an invisible decrease pay attention when working into the next stitch don t accidentally work into the second stitch of the decrease just worked you should be working into the stitch i am indicating with my pen here round 25 2sc decrease 4sc decrease x 5 2sc 30scs stuff before decreasing any further stuff the pointy end break your stuffing up into small bits and stuff the tip a little at a time to build up a good firm shape it helps to use a pencil or the end of a crochet hook to gently push the stuffing into the narrowest bit once you have stuffed the tip and about halfway down the body continue the pattern if you are using safety eyes you might want to add these now too round 26 3sc decrease x 6 24scs round 27 1sc decrease 2sc decrease x 5 1sc 18scs stuff add some more stuffing at this point breaking it up small and stuffing bit by bit to get a good firm shape round 28 1sc decrease x 6 12scs stuff final call for stuffing continue to stuff little by little until you have built up the shape and firmness you want quite firm is good but not so much that it s rock hard ©ali debuc 2021 round 29 decrease x 5 skip next single_crochet slip_stitch in last single_crochet 5scs + 1 slip_stitch cut the yarn leaving a tail and pull it through using a tapestry needle weave the tail through the front loops of the 6scs from round 29 as shown slip_stitch at end of round 29 pull the tail… …all the way through 1 bring the tail from 2 bring the tail from complete steps 1 and 2 front to back in the front back to front in the front until all 6scs have been loop of first single_crochet loop of next single_crochet worked weave in the end arms and legs make 4 round 1 make 6sc into a magic_ring pull the hole closed tightly you may find it easier to do this after round 2 round 2-4 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around cut yarn leaving a tail for sewing pull the yarn right through the last single_crochet you made thread onto a darning needle and bring the yarn through the front loop of the next stitch from front
